Hi there can you confirm whether case manager (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) is still working with SHU inmates at MCC or has he been transferred to a different caseload, unit or facility after Jeffrey Epstein death? Also can you confirm the status of Assistant Warden Shirley Skipper Scott?

additional_notes: The document contains redacted information marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The email is from an unknown sender to the Public Information Office of the Federal Bureau of Prisons. The email discusses the status of a case manager and Assistant Warden Shirley Skipper Scott after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
